pioneer.translation[0].definitions[0].de: someone who is important in the early development of something, and whose work or ideas are later developed by other people
pioneer.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: He was a pioneer in the field of biotechnology.
John Whitney was a pioneer of computer animation.
pioneer.translation[0].definitions[1].de: one of the first people to travel to a new country or area and begin living there, farming etc
pioneer.translation[0].definitions[1].ex: the early pioneers of the Dakota territory
pioneer.translation[1].definitions[0].de: to be the first person to do, invent, or use something
pioneer.translation[1].definitions[0].ex: The new cancer treatment was pioneered in the early eighties by Dr Sylvia Bannerjee.
pioneer.translation[2].definitions[0].de: the first person or organization to do something that other people and organizations later develop or continue to do
pioneer.translation[2].definitions[0].ex: pioneers willing to try a new software product and lead others to it
Victor Co. of Japan, pioneer of the videocassette recorder
Kentucky Fried Chicken, one of the pioneers in the fast-food business
